definition: prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough

public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)

public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)

sentences.english: Santa Claus suddenly remembered the elk hung bells around his neck.
sentences.chinese: 突然想起聖誕老公公的麋鹿脖子上掛着的鈴鐺。

sentences.english: Santa needs to know if the sun will produce a huge amount of radiation on December 24th.
sentences.chinese: 聖誕老公公問姚平安夜那天會不會有大量的太陽輻射。

sentences.english: However, this image of Santa Claus has evolved over the years.
sentences.chinese: 然而，聖誕老公公的形象可是逐年發展來的喔。

sentences.english: Father Christmas in the department stores are especially adored by kids.
sentences.chinese: 百貨公司裏的聖誕老公公特別受到孩子們的喜愛。

sentences.english: Please put mail into this mail box if you wanna send mail to Santa.
sentences.chinese: 如果想寄信給聖誕老公公，請用這個郵筒。

sentences.english: Mommy, Hurry! We need to prepare cookies and milk for Santa and all the deers .
sentences.chinese: 媽咪，趕快準備好餅乾和牛奶給聖誕老公公。

sentences.english: Santa Claus always has a busy night on Christmas Eve.
sentences.chinese: 聖誕老公公在平安夜總是很忙碌的。

sentences.english: We hung our stockings by the chimney for Santa to fill.
sentences.chinese: 我們把長襪掛在煙囪旁讓聖誕老公公裝禮物。

definition: (coll.) father's father's mother/paternal great-grandmother/respectful form of address for an old woman
daughter-in-law/wife (of a younger man)/young married woman/young woman
(informal) grandma (paternal grandmother)/(respectful) mistress of the house/CL:位[wei4]/(coll.) boobies/breasts
